page.title: 02PEOPLE IN PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: Families normally have two or three children living with Mum and Dad.Other {relatives}do not normally live with the family except on special occasions or when they are very old.Families tend to spread out as the children look for{employment}but they keep in touch by telephone. Some families are split up because of{divorce}which is more frequent nowadays. Most of our{clothes}are made in factories from cotton,wool & synthetic fibres. During the{day}ladies wear dresses or skirts with blouses but men usually wear suits or trousers with a jacket.At{school}everyone wears the same uniform. Jeans can be worn by anyone for casual wear.At{night}anyone can wear pyjamas but females sometimes wear nightdresses.There are{special {clothes}for swimming, games, parties, weddings and for protection.
